Instance.description: A PreferenceItem subtype that represents a Sim Characteristic preference, using traits, activities, and lifestyles to define the preference. This subtype will be used to calculate the compatibility between 2 Sims.

TunableList.name: trait_map
TunableList.description: A mapping of the desired traits associated with this PreferenceItem, and the corresponding scores.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The desired trait. This could be a standard trait, an activity like/dislike trait, or a lifestyle trait.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The score associated with this trait. If there's a match, this value gets added to the overall compatibility score.
